name: lightdash-navigator
title: Lightdash Navigator
description: Search and open Lightdash Dashboards, Charts, and Spaces quickly.
author: endiruslan

commands.name: lightdash-search
commands.title: Search Lightdash
commands.description: Quickly search Lightdash Dashboards, Charts, and Spaces.

preferences.name: lightdashUrl
preferences.title: Lightdash Instance URL
preferences.description: Your Lightdash instance URL (e.g., https://app.lightdash.cloud or https://lightdash.yourcompany.com)

preferences.name: personalAccessToken
preferences.title: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Personal Access Token created in Lightdash Settings

preferences.name: projectUuid
preferences.title: Project UUID
preferences.description: UUID of the Lightdash project to search in. Found in the project URL: /projects/{projectUuid}/...

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
